phrases: We are going to save everyone!
We are going to save'them, no matter what!
Angels who have lost their wings...
The Exceeds have been poisoned by the filth of Earthland and have Fallen!
Two of the Fallen are escaping!
There is no way that Happy's a traitor!
No way in hell, I say!
I am going to bust this thing wide open!
This has got to be some sort of joke, right?
Something is coming from the castle...
It is those heroes from before!
I-I am not tired, or anything...
I must live up to the Queen's expectations!
It is way bigger than the one we saw in the Royal City.
That is everyone from Fairy Tail!
So that is where they were...
Are we on a floating island?
If the Royal City is way down there, then...
Basically, the situation would look like this.
H-How are we going to get down to the Royal City?
We cannot use our Aera like we are now...
What the heck ya think yer doing on my fields?
Yer those Fallen who the Royal Guard're searchin' about for, yeah?
Did that cart which ran me over head over this way?
I said get outta my fields!
Did you already report to them?
My, you are home early today, dear.
That sounds like quite a lot of trouble.
My husband here does not really go with how the kingdom thinks.
We were kicked out long ago, and make our lives here.
Do not go blabbin' about that stuff!
After you eat, yer going to help with the work!
But I have never done this before...
I did not know that a hoe was this heavy, sir...
That is called the weight of life itself!
He sure makes a big deal outta things...
But if he hears me, he will get mad, so I will keep it to myself...
Doing this much is just par for the course!
Do not just gawk at it!
He was just gawking at it himself...
But if he hears me, he will get mad, so I will keep it to myself...
I told ya, I can hear it all!
Oh, you are very good at this.
We have made some nice cold drinks!
Why do not you rest for a bit?
Do not go drinkin' before me!
I am glad they let me out of those stocks,
but what is with this sticky stuff?
I would really appreciate you taking off this sticky stuff, too!
It is not like I can escape anyway!
Are all Earthland women like this?
I am not sensing any magical power from my keys...
As I thought, this sticky stuff is suppressing my magic power...
I wonder what happened to everyone?
Hurry up and take me back to the guild.
I took them to the Royal City, just like you asked.
Those guys are seriously planning on taking on the Royal Army.
So, you refill this thing's lacrima?
The army has searched through the black market and everywhere else,
and there is not even a shard of a lacrima left.
I think it will be out of magic power about when we reach the guild.
And yet you had me ride to the Royal City and back...
We are such big softies, you and I.
Do not get all cheeky with me, bub!
I am happy that he is hiding us, but he sure works me hard...
I figured he could hear me...
I wonder if Natsu and the others are safe...
I really do not have time to be doing this stuff...
Do not go thinkin' of other stuff when yer workin'!
After yer done with that, we will be splittin' logs!
You have not smiled once since you came to this house, have you?
Even though you have such a pretty face...
I am in no mood to smile...
You are struggling with something, yes?
It is even more important to smile during those times.
It is not so simple, I know...
I are not going to lose!
We will leave it like this.
Why will not you leave me alone?
Does not it feel nice here after taking a bath?
Your names are Happy and Carla, if I recall.
You were born on Earthland, yes?
Who was it that named you?
Those friends have been captured by the kingdom.
We have to go save them!
So, you are going to rescue humans...
In Extalia, thinking like that is wrong, yes?
Being friends has nothing to do with being Human or Exceed...
After all, even if we look different, the shape of your heart that loves others is the same.
The shape of a loving heart is the same for everyone.
My heart is not my own...
It is being manipulated by someone else...
I do not even know if the words I am saying now are my own, or...
Our hearts that want to rescue our friends are our own!
You might be a little lost now, but I am sure you will be fine.
You have such a wonderful knight next to you, after all!
You can find your own heart.
Or rather, it is already within you.
All you need to do is realize that.
Believe in the love you feel.
You are a strange one, madam.
Because all the Exceeds think that they are like angels or something.
They said that humans are an inferior race.
Yes... I once thought like that.
But then our children were taken by the Queen...
She collected eggs... 100 children, for the Dragon Slayer Extermination Project.
Then, without even seeing the faces of our children, they were sent to Earthland.
We were kicked out of the kingdom because we opposed the project...
We are not gods or angels...
We are just parents, that is all...
Then, it did not matter whether one was an Exceed or a Human any more.
My husband can be a bit harsh, but I feel the same way.
Stop talkin' about that dumb stuff!
How much longer are y'going to be here?!
Yer makin' such a down face!
Do not be such a softy!
Dear, is not that a bit sudden?
We have to go save everyone, and soon!
If you stay bein' this scared, you could not do it even if you had a chance!
Kids these days do not understand nothing!
Carla, did you understand what he just said?
When I arrived at Edolas, I was filled with unease!
The only creatures in Edolas who have magic power inside them...
The reason we could not use magic was because of the unease in our hearts!
When we can see the shape of our hearts, wings will let us move forward!
Take a look a that, Marl!
He flies just like you, Lucky...
It are not just in how he flies...
Do you think that she was his girlfriend?
Yer 100 years too young to be bringin' a girl home!
He was raised to be a kind child who is thoughtful of his friends...
I am going to save you, Natsu!
That is like opposite the usual pattern.
For some reason, I am all excited though!
It is okay to think of myself as the main character this time, right?
Whatever, just come save us already!
Are you sure you should be talking to me like that?
That is less like being the hero, and more being the big evil boss!
